name: df-ipo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cipo, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s3, copab(s1, s2, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(s0)), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, cv(s3)))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cv(s3)), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s1, cv(s0), cuni(crab(s2, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ toInc =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[{ < s1, s2 > |({ s1, s2 } ‚äÜ s0 ‚àß s1 ‚äÜ s2)} / s3]({ <(Base ` ndx), s0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` s3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), s3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s2 ‚àà s0 |(s2 ‚ãÇ s1)= ‚àÖ })> }))
comment: For any family of sets, define the poset of that family ordered by inclusion. See ~ ipobas , ~ ipolerval , and ~ ipole for its contract. _EDITORIAL_: I'm not thrilled with the name. Any suggestions? (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
